title: Update Providing-Binary-Logs.md
body:
Alleviates general ux issue with attachment security.

### Context
We've recently run into an issue with the UX on the MS Build community. This is an attempt to alleviate that.

### Changes Made
Updated the providing binary logs with a warning.

### Testing
Documentation only change.

nodes.body: if you have a screenshot, you'll need to check it into the repo and reference it - this kind of reference isn't stable and is tied to your GitHub user account
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -54,3 +54,12 @@ Further reading:
 ### Capturing specific logs for chosen build invocations
 
 See [this guide](https://github.com/dotnet/project-system-tools) in the Project System Tools repo for capturing binlogs through Visual Studio.
+
+> [!TIP]
+> You can share your logs with us anonymously [via MS developer community](https://developercommunity.microsoft.com/dotnet/report).
+![share_binlog](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/dd792afe-9687-4d19-83b2-38abe11000a3)
